abstract: Jeannette Catsoulis reviews movie Bourek, directed by Vladan Nikolic.

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Bourek,’ About a Group of Drifting Souls
headline.main: Review: ‘Bourek,’ About a Group of Drifting Souls

snippet: Assorted characters on an island bicker and lounge against a backdrop of news reports heralding social and financial catastrophe.
lead_paragraph: Assorted characters on an island bicker and lounge against a backdrop of news reports heralding social and financial catastrophe.
